title: Looking for 1887 N28 Cap Anson in 6,7, or 8
author: Archive

posts.post_title: Looking for 1887 N28 Cap Anson in 6,7, or 8
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Don Senges
This is my first time posting...so by way of introduction...I have been a collector/dealer for a long time now and recently sold off my inventory to focus exclusively on collecting HOF'ers and specialty sets. Some of you may know me from all the 1911 E94s I have been selling off over the last 3-4 months (ebay id: baseballcardinvestments).

I am currently looking for an 1887 N28 Cap Anson in PSA 6, 7, or 8. If anyone has any leads, let me know. Thanks.

Don

PS - I have a few other items I am looking for right now (e.g., T206s) and will post on the appropriate board.

posts.post_title: Looking for 1887 N28 Cap Anson in 6,7, or 8

Posted By: Jay
Its not a 6, but it looks pretty good.

Thanks,

Noel
